text.__SUMMARY__: Prunus mirabilis is a species of plant in the family Rosaceae. It is a tree endemic to Borneo where it is confined to Sabah.
text.References: Kalkman, C. (1998). "Prunus mirabilis". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T34614A9878349. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T34614A9878349.en. Retrieved 22 December 2017.
